description: Offline the specified region for the specified Azure Cosmos DB database account.

resource_group_name.description: Name of an Azure resource group.

api_version.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2015-04-08.

region_parameter_for_offline.description: Cosmos DB region to offline for the database account.

region.description: Cosmos DB region, with spaces between words and each word capitalized.
